body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Waddill Richardson in Pittsylvania County, Virginia, on January 27, 1809. Married to Betsey Wadill Richardson in Pittsylvania County, Virginia, on January 31, 1818. Father of Meriwether Richardson, Henry Richardson, Harriet A. Richardson, Sarah Richardson, and Catherine V. Richardson. Farmer in Trigg County in 1850. Owned twenty-two enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1850. Farmer in Trigg County in 1860. Owned twenty-six enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860.
